directions: Fill four 10-ounce wineglasses with ice cubes. Pour 2 tablespoons port, then 1/2 cup fruit beverage into each glass. Twist or tie each lemon peel strip with orange peel strip. Garnish drinks with peels.
ingredients: 2 cups sparkling cranberry juice beverage or other sparkling fruit juice beverage
title: Passion-for-Port Spritzer
